text: Pully railway station () is a railway station in the municipality of Pully, in the Swiss canton of Vaud. It is an intermediate stop on the standard gauge Simplon line of Swiss Federal Railways and is served by local trains only. The station is approximately south of on the Lausanne–Bern line. == Services == The following services stop at Pully: * RER Vaud: ** : hourly service between and ; one daily round-trip continues from Villeneuve to . ** : hourly service between and Villeneuve; one daily round-trip continues from Villeneuve to St- Maurice. == References == == External links == * * Category:Railway stations in the canton of Vaud Category:Swiss Federal Railways stations
title: Pully railway station
